Description: Sets policy and control requirements so LLM systems meet legal, safety, and internal standards.
Owns deployment infrastructure and runtime performance for secure, scalable model serving.
Implements prompts, retrieval, and orchestration logic that powers user-facing LLM features.
Defines outcomes, prioritizes scope, and aligns technical work with user and business needs.
Designs test suites and quality metrics to measure model reliability before and after release.
Designs, trains, and adapts models while balancing quality, latency, and operational constraints in production.
Builds monitoring, observability, and incident workflows that keep LLM systems healthy in production.
